minecraft:scatter_feature.iterations: v.layer.block = 'violecite'; v.layer.content.size.method = 'variable'; v.layer.content.size.minimum = 3; v.layer.content.size.maximum = 3; v.layer.content.size.variation.method = 'noise'; v.layer.content.size.variation.spread = 128; v.layer.content.size.variation.offset.x = 4; v.layer.content.size.variation.offset.z = 8; v.layer.content.looping_offset = 128; v.layer.padding.size.method = 'constant'; v.layer.padding.size.value = 2; return 1;
